title: Respond to HCP about Potential Drug Interaction
description: A medical information specialist receives a call from a pharmacist asking about a potential drug-drug interaction for a specific product.

tasks.description: Log the inquiry, capturing the two drugs in question.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a new medical inquiry case with the relevant product names.

tasks.description: Search the product's prescribing information (package insert) and the internal knowledge base for known interaction data.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds information in the knowledge base detailing a moderate pharmacokinetic interaction.

tasks.description: Verbally communicate the findings to the pharmacist in a balanced, non-promotional manner.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly explains the nature of the interaction and the recommendations listed in the product labeling.

tasks.description: Document the details of the conversation and the information provided in the case system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent writes a concise and accurate summary of the interaction and closes the case.
